channel.title: Most lame problem ever.. basic command won't work. [317] Delta

item.title: Most lame problem ever.. basic command won't work. [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @Sun_Chips Sun Chips
item.description:
@Sun_Chips wrote:

I’m not dogging on you just whoever was using the “startsWith” method in a teleport command but teleport commands should use equalsIgnoreCase();.
so

} if(command.startsWith("Skillzone")){ triggerTele(2345, 3691, 0); sM("Welcome to the new skiller zone!"); }

becomes

} if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Skillzone")){ triggerTele(2345, 3691, 0); sM("Welcome to the new skiller zone!"); }

this gets rid of needing to make your commands case sensitive and is the right way of doing it anyways.

edit: just realized death basically already said this but it really should be emphasized.

Read full topic
item.source: Most lame problem ever.. basic command won't work. [317] Delta

item.title: Most lame problem ever.. basic command won't work. [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Zyle beat me to it, but yea:

The only thing I notice just by looking at it is that the ‘S’ in skillzone is capitalized, so it wouldn’t work unless you typed ::Skillzone.

Also, since this command doesn’t have any arguments you should use equalsIgnoreCase instead of startsWith.

Read full topic
item.source: Most lame problem ever.. basic command won't work. [317] Delta

item.title: Most lame problem ever.. basic command won't work. [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“mod xtomx, post:1, topic:391824”]Hello, I got this command here…

} if(command.startsWith("Skillzone")){ triggerTele(2345, 3691, 0); sM("Welcome to the new skiller zone!"); }

All I did was copy the home command, changed the coords and the title, and it won’t work at all… all other commands BUT this one work, I put that command RIGHT under the home, it compiled fine and I run the server fine, but when I do ::skillzone, nothing happens at all. I’ve tried so many alternative ways of teleporting and nothing works. I got no idea what this could be at ALL.

EDIT: OK so I tried something like “triplex” which works, but when I try changing it to anything like, “skillz” or “skillazone” nothing it won’t work at all. I have no oter skill command in my server that could interfere either…[/quote]

Maybe because you put a capital ‘S’.

Read full topic
